text:
We are DESPERATE  for the #SARSCoV2 #COVID19 #coronavirus Vaccine! 

I'd encourage all to have it.

My son is 7, he has a terminal heart condition. 
We have been shielding for 14mnth!

There is no #vaccine approved for kids yet. 

Feel lucky if you're offered a vaccination! https://t.co/CymE5EIliq
